member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the SpellCheck operation should be take place. By default the value is true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.SfSpellChecker.EnableContextMenu
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the ContextMenu can be shown. It is used to show the suggestion for wrong words, and built in commands. Default value is true.
member.remarks: SpellCheck operations will be processed only if the EnableSpellCheck property is true. Default TextBoxâ€™s ContextMenu will be overridden.
